Hoboken.Florent (restaurant):
Florent was an all-night diner in the Meatpacking District of Manhattan that opened in 1985 and closed in 2008.


== History ==
Florent was located at 69 Gansevoort Street, one of the few remaining cobblestone streets in New York City. In 1985 Florent Morellet took over the R&L Restaurant, which had opened in 1943, and renamed it Florent.
